tool.name: Create peptide table
tool.command:
msspeptable psm2pep -i '$psmtable' -o peptidetable.txt --scorecolpattern '$scorecol' #if $fncol --spectracol $fncol #end if #if $isoquant.yesno.value == "true" --isobquantcolpattern $isoquant.isobpattern #end if #if $precurqcolpattern --ms1quantcolpattern '$precurqcolpattern' #end if
#if $isoquant.yesno.value == "true" && msspsmtable isoquant -i '$psmtable' -o isoquant.txt --targettable peptidetable.txt --protcol $isoquant.accessioncol --isobquantcolpattern '$isoquant.isobpattern' --denompatterns '$isoquant.denompatterns' --minint '$isoquant.minint' #if $isoquant.normalize.type != "false" --normalize median #if $isoquant.normalize.type == "medianother" --norm-ratios $isoquant.normalize.norm_ratio_table #end if #end if && mv isoquant.txt peptidetable.txt #end if && mv peptidetable.txt '$output'

param.name: psmtable
param.label: PSM table
param.help: Must contain isobaric ratios and accession of protein/gene/peptide

param.name: fncol
param.label: Column number containing spectra file name

param.name: scorecol
param.label: Regular expression pattern to identify score column

param.name: precurqcolpattern
param.label: Regular expression pattern to identify precursor quant columns

param.name: isobpattern
param.label: Pattern for isobaric quant columns in PSM table
param.help: Regex to find quant columns, e.g. tmt10plex, itraq8plex, plex

param.name: denompatterns
param.label: Patterns for denominator isobaric quant columns in PSM table
param.help: Multiple are separated with space, e.g. _126 _127N

param.name: accessioncol
param.label: Accession column number in PSM table containing the proteins, genes, peptides to quantify

param.name: minint
param.label: Minimum intensity of PSM channel to include

param.name: type
param.label: Use isobaric data?
param.option: Median center using ratios from other table

param.name: norm_ratio_table
param.label: Tabular datatable with ratios
param.help: Same isobaric quant columns should occur

tool.help: Creates a peptide table from PSM table. It is optional to add isobaric quant, precursor quant, probabilities.
